i1.name: Staggering Blow
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nautilus's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|8 to 110}}|physical damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|root}} his target for {{passive progression/deprecated version|4|changedisplay=true|0.75 to 1.5|1 to 16}} seconds.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Nautilus's basic attacks deal Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 8 to 110 bonus physical damage and root his target for Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 4 changedisplay=true 0.75 to 1.5 1 to 16 seconds.This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the {{tip|root}} but not the bonus damage.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Staggering Blow's'' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

q1.name: Dredge Line
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' hurls his anchor forward in a line in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, it simultaneously {{tip|airborne|drags}} them towards '''Nautilus''' while he {{tip|dash|dashes}} towards them within {{fd|0.9}} seconds, during which the target is {{tip|sight|revealed}}, and dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
If the anchor hits terrain instead, '''Nautilus''' dashes to that location entirely and ''Dredge Line'' refunds 50% of its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|mana|{{as|mana cost}}}}.
'''''Nautilus''' is unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight.''
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward in a line in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, it simultaneously drags them towards Nautilus while he dashes towards them within 0.9 seconds, during which the target is revealed, and dealing magic damage and rooting them for 0.1 seconds.If the anchor hits terrain instead, Nautilus dashes to that location entirely and Dredge Line refunds 50% of its cooldown and mana cost.Nautilus is unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight.
q1.notes:
* ''Dredge Line'' can interact with player-created terrain ({{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}).
* '''Nautilus''' will {{tip|dash}} all the way to the target's location if ''Dredge Line'' executed them or they negated the {{tip|airborne|displacement}}.
* ''Dredge Line'' will not interrupt any movement commands '''Nautilus''' was issued pre-cast so long as their directions somewhat correlate (this is intentional to smooth out traveling/escaping).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability but '''Nautilus''' will still dash partway to the target.
* The anchor projectile will stop if '''Nautilus''' dies while the projectile is traveling. Enemies hit will still be dealt damage. The {{tip|airborne|drag}} and {{tip|root}} are not applied if '''Nautilus''' did not initiate the dash.
* '''Nautilus''' will attempt to [[basic attack]] his target at the end of the dash. This attack will not grant a stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}, {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{ri|Phase Rush}} or {{ii|Spellthief's Edge}} and sometimes will if used at close range (never granted if ''Dredge Line'' is hits an enemy at far range).

w1.name: Titan's Wrath
description: While the shield holds, his [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} over 2 seconds to his target and all enemies around them.
''Titan's Wrath'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Nautilus' ''' basic attack timer.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Nautilus shields himself for up to 6 seconds.While the shield holds, his basic attacks deal bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to his target and all enemies around them.Titan's Wrath resets Nautilus' basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|30 to 70}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* The first half of ''Titan's Wrath's'' damage is dealt [[on-hit]] (so long as the shield remains) while the rest is applied over the next second (regardless of '''Nautilus' ''' {{stil|attack speed}}).
* '''Nautilus' ''' basic attacks use different animations while ''Titan's Wrath'' is active.
** The damage over time will always apply when this animation plays (even if the shield fades during a basic attack).
* ''Titan's Wrath'' does not deal bonus damage to structures.
* {{pending for test}}: Interaction with {{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability (but only a single application).

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|30 to 70}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Second: (+ 20% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

e1.name: Riptide
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' creates 3 waves of explosions that radiate from him {{tt|over {{fd|0.561}} seconds|See notes}}, each dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by an amount that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt half damage.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Nautilus creates 3 waves of explosions that radiate from him over 0.561 seconds, each dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds.Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt half damage.
leveling: {{st|Additional Magic Damage|{{ap|27.5|42.5|57.5|72.5|87.5}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|110|170|230|290|350}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single wave.
* ''Riptide'' will cast from wherever '''Nautilus''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The first wave is centered around '''Nautilus''', while the second and third wave are centered at an offset of 25 units in front of '''Nautilus''' at the original cast location.
** Because of this, there are a zone each in which you can be hit by only 1 wave, or all 3 waves, respectively, without moving.
* The first wave happens at 0 seconds after the cast time ends, the second wave at {{fd|0.297}} seconds and the third wave at {{fd|0.561}} seconds.
** The intended timing may be {{fd|0.25}} seconds for each delay, however these are the measured, effective times.
* The ''explosions'' are only a visual effect. The first wave has 8, the seconds has 9, and the third wave has 10 explosions, equally distributed around the rings, starting with one explosion directly in '''Nautilus'''' facing direction on each.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Wave: (+ 30% AP)

  • Slow:
